Blenders: A social networking platform specifically designed for Blender enthusiasts to connect, share their work, and collaborate on projects.
BlenderMorph: A mobile app that allows users to create 3D models and animations using Blender on their smartphones.
BlenderMarket: An online marketplace where users can buy and sell Blender-related assets, such as models, textures, and plugins.
BlenderFest: A festival celebrating the art and science of 3D animation and visual effects, featuring workshops, demonstrations, and competitions.
BlenderBuds: A subscription service that provides users with access to a library of pre-made 3D models and animations, as well as tutorials and resources to help them create their own.
